title: Update business phone number and location everywhere it appears

requirements.text: Make the business phone number and location (address) editable from a single source of truth in `frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts`, and ensure the Contact section displays those values from `siteContent.contact`.
acceptanceCriteria: `siteContent.contact.phone` and `siteContent.contact.address` are the only values that need to be edited to change the phone/address shown in the Contact section.
`frontend/src/sections/ContactSection.tsx` continues to render the phone and address from `siteContent.contact` (no hardcoded duplicates introduced).
All user-facing labels remain in English.

requirements.text: Remove hardcoded phone number and address from the footer and render the footer “Visit Us” block using `siteContent.contact.address` and `siteContent.contact.phone` so updates automatically propagate to the footer.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx` no longer contains hardcoded address/phone strings (e.g., "123 Main Street" or "(415) 555-0123").
Footer “Visit Us” displays the same phone/address as the Contact section, sourced from `frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts`.
No other footer content/regressions are introduced (quick links and branding still render).

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose existing UI components instead).
Do not modify immutable hook/bootstrap files (e.g., `frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts[x]`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`).
nonGoals: Adding a backend/admin panel to manage contact details.
Adding geolocation, maps, GPS, or third-party map SDK integrations.
